Author: blokcoin
Title: BlokCoin ICO Sets Stage for Future of Trading
Body: All signs point to a bull market in 2019, and the new exchange platform BlokCoin, currently in ICO, has positioned itself to enhance crypto adoption and improve trading experience in the growing market. With the hype phase of cryptocurrency coming to an end, BlokCoin was conceived to bridge the worlds of crypto and fiat while establishing a new and accessible financial ecosystem where users are in control.  The current wintry conditions of the crypto market demonstrate the need for user control, and BlokCoin provides just that. Designed to establish trust, BlokCoin grants exclusive control to users through a voting system in which users decide which tokens are featured. Through this, users become players, forging their own ecosystem. User control is undoubtedly the future of crypto, and this feature along positions BlokCoin to quickly become a top exchange.  In addition to providing people with much needed control, BlokCoin aims to further integrate the worlds of crypto and fiat. After years of tentatively observing from the sidelines, governments and major financial institutions worldwide are jumping into the world of crypto, and individuals will follow en masse. By allowing individuals to purchase with a credit card, BlokCoin removes a major barrier to those who have yet to establish a wallet, instituting itself as an optimally accessible platform.  In the Hype Cycle, research and advisory firm Gartner outlines the cycle a new technology goes through, stating that innovation instantly leads to a “peak of inflated expectations.” Eventually, expectations deflate, and the technology enters a “trough of disillusionment.”  The crypto world is currently in that trough. Yet, with everything that has been learned in the last years, a new exchange like BlokCoin can be created to remedy the shortcomings and pitfalls of the past and lead the crypto world up the “slope of enlightenment” and onto the “plateau of productivity.” Indeed, no longer will crypto lack security and accessibility. No longer will it be controlled by the few in power.  BlokCoin combines all the best aspects of an exchange to make crypto a viable option to all.  A bear market is a buyers market, and with major growth impending, there is no greater time to enter the world of crypto. Through creating an enhanced user interface and streamlining the link between fiat and crypto, BlokCoin is setting the stage for the future of crypto and a bullish 2019.
